Title: WordWalkingStick for Office Word 2010
Description: My handy support tool for working with Office Word is WordWalkingStick. The use of the word “my” means this tool is for me. But it might be useful for you. Portions of this project is based on PowerTools for Open XML and the excellent work of Microsoft’s Eric White.
HomeWiki:
Note: you can browse this project’s source code live.

My handy support tool for working with Office Word is WordWalkingStick. The use of the word “my” means this tool is for me. But it might be useful for you. Portions of this project are based on PowerTools for Open XML and the excellent work of Microsoft’s Eric White. This project is uses the following technologies and techniques:

  • VSTO with Ribbon XML, hosting WPF.
  • Application Composition with a ‘Host’ singleton designed for MEF.
  • Loosely coupled Composition Messaging with MVVM Light
  • Commanding with MVVM Light

The HTML markup used for this descriptive text was generated by WordWalkingStick!
